name: hello-world
summary: Hello World demo plugin for jPulse Framework
description:
This demo plugin showcases the jPulse Framework plugin system with:

  • Dynamic Configuration: Tab-based settings with various field types
  • MVC Components: Controller, Model, and View integration
  • Append Mode: Extending framework CSS and JavaScript

Use this as a reference when creating your own plugins.
author: jPulse Team <team@jpulse.net>
